name: Who's The Star of the Movie? Quiz | Name the Player | 10 Questions

questions.text: 'Amadeus' refers to Mozart, but the principal figure in the story was Salieri. Who played Salieri?
questions.explanation:
F. Murray Abraham

	Abraham won an Oscar (deservedly) for the role. Hulce was nominated for his role as Mozart but did not win; he was also excellent.

questions.text: The principal character in the movie 'Julia' was actually Julia's friend, Lillian? Who played Lillian?
questions.explanation:
Jane Fonda.

	Redgrave played Julia. Fonda played Lillian Hellman.

questions.text: The movie 'Becket' is equally about two men : Becket and the King of England. Who played the King?
'Laura' is about a missing woman, but it's also about the detective who investigates her. Who plays the obsessed detective?
questions.explanation:
Dana Andrews.

	Price and Webb were also in the movie.

questions.text: In 'Witness for the Prosecution', the key role doesn't belong to the witness or to the prosecution - it belongs to the attorney for the defense? Who played him?
questions.explanation:
Charles Laughton.

	Power was the defendant.

questions.text: 'Taras Bulba' is a fine adventure story, but it is the son of Taras Bulba who is the star of the movie. Who played the son?
In 'The Wizard of Oz', the wizard is actually a relatively minor character (in terms of screen time). Nevertheless, who played the wizard?
questions.explanation:
Frank Morgan.

	Baum was the author. Lahr and Haley (and Bolger) were in the movie.

questions.text: 'The Prisoner of Zenda' isn't primarily about the prisoner - it's about the man who impersonates him. Who played both roles?
In the movie 'JFK', the key figure is actually Jim Garrison (who is played by Kevin Costner). Garrison, however appeared in the movie, too. In what role?
questions.explanation:
Earl Warren.

	Justice Warren - as in the Warren Commission.

questions.text: Sue Lyon played 'Lolita', but the primary character in the movie was Humbert Humbert. Who played him?
questions.explanation:
James Mason.

	Sellers was also in the movie.
